Name: Cataclysmic Surge
Story Background: When the elemental forces of destruction converge, a cataclysmic surge engulfs the battlefield, leaving only smoldering ruins in its wake.
Ability: Cataclysmic Surge deals 5 damage to each creature and each player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a fiery tempest of raging inferno consuming the battlefield, with swirling tendrils of flame engulfing hapless creatures and leaving behind a scorched and desolate landscape.
